articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: iOS 19: All the rumored changes Apple could be bringing to its new operating system - TechCrunch
articles.description: As Apple prepares to unveil iOS 19 at WWDC 2025, several rumors have surfaced, including a potential new name for the operating system and more.
articles.content: As Apple prepares to unveil iOS 19 at WWDC 2025 on Monday, several rumors have surfaced, including a potential new name for the operating system, an entirely new design inspired by the Vision Pro, an… [+2967 chars]
